general_info.summary: This text appears to be a footer or a small section of a web page, likely from Galgotias University. It includes links to a vision plan, an annual report, and a chat feature with ambassadors. It also contains copyright information and credits the developer.
general_info.raw_content:

eligibilityCriteria.requiredUndergraduateDegree: Bachelor of Science in a related field

requiredDocuments: Official transcripts from all previous institutions

standardizedTests: SAT (minimum score of 1000) or ACT (minimum score of 20)
eligibilityCriteria.englishProficiency: TOEFL (iBT score of 80 or higher) or IELTS (score of 6.5 or higher) for non-native English speakers
